summary: Adds collisions to fire and candle statics which previously did not have any.  Done by request.
descriptionHtml:
==========================================================
Fire Collision Resources                         by jonwd7

v1.0.2                                           7/21/2012
==========================================================

 This was done by request and adds collision to many of
the fire and candle statics which previously did not have
any. This is useful for scripting events. This should NOT
be used to add collisions to these objects for the sake of
it. The PC and NPCs are likely to catch on the wall candle
for example.

 There are 11 included statics so far. I have appended
\"withcoll\" to the filenames, but in most cases, these
should replace the vanilla mesh.

 Collision versions are included in this resource for:
 
 `````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
| meshes\\clutter\\candles\\candleHornWall01.nif
| meshes\\clutter\\woodfires\\firePlaceWood01Burning.nif
| meshes\\clutter\\woodfires\\firePlaceWood01Off.nif
| meshes\\effects\\fxFireWithEmbers01.nif
| meshes\\effects\\fxFireWithEmbers01_cheap.nif
| meshes\\effects\\fxFireWithEmbers01_lite.nif
| meshes\\effects\\fxFireWithEmbers02.nif
| meshes\\effects\\fxFireWithEmbers02toggle.nif
| meshes\\effects\\fxFireWithEmbers03.nif
| meshes\\effects\\fxFireWithEmbersHeavyToggle.nif
| meshes\\effects\\TestCandleFlame01.nif
 ________________________________________________________

 More will be added if necessary.

==========================================================
CHANGELOG
==========================================================
1.0.0 - Initial Release
1.0.1 - Fixed flags in NifSkope so collisions actually
        work now. Fixed scaling and positioning issues.
        Collision Geometry may not appear correct in CK,
        but it works in game.
1.0.2 - Fixed some more NifSkope flags
author: jonwd7
